Title: (Updated) Realtime voice is now available in M365 Copilot Chat and M365 Copilot
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact
Summary: Realtime voice chat is now available in Microsoft 365 Copilot, enabling hands-free, natural interactions for brainstorming, searching, and more. The feature rolls out worldwide starting September 2025, is on by default, requires no admin setup, and supports iOS, Android, Web, Windows, and Mac platforms.

Title: Microsoft Viva Copilot Analytics launches new agent dashboard
Summary: Microsoft Viva Copilot Analytics introduces a new Agent Dashboard for detailed insights on agent adoption and Copilot credit usage. Rolling out from November 2025 (preview) to February 2026 (general availability), it targets organizations with 50+ Copilot licenses, enhancing adoption tracking and management within Viva Insights.

Title: (Updated) Multiple account access to Copilot in Microsoft 365 desktop and mobile apps
Tags: Updated message, New feature, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Starting March 2025, Microsoft 365 will allow multiple account access to Copilot in desktop and mobile apps, enabling users to use Copilot on any permitted document across accounts. Enterprise data protection applies based on file access identity. Admins can restrict this via a Cloud Policy available by January 2025.

Title: New support for HR and employee profile data in Microsoft 365 Copilot connectors
Tags: New feature, User impact, Admin impact
Summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot now supports HR and employee profile data via connectors like BambooHR and custom Microsoft Graph connectors, enhancing people profiles with authoritative external data. Administrators configure these in the Admin Center. Public preview runs mid-May to mid-November 2025; general availability starts mid-November 2025.
